resources.string: This activity should show playlist\'s songs in a ListView. When pressed on a song in a list explicit Intent is being sent to NowPlayingActivity
This activity should show user\'s selected favorite songs in a ListView. When pressed on a song in a list explicit Intent is being sent to NowPlayingActivity

This is the home activity, that contains playlists, and recent songs ListView.
 Playlists has ImageView and TextView that is informing user about playlist's content. When clicked on the playlist image explicit Intent is being called to the corresponding playlist's screen.
 ListView would show newly added songs and is scrollable When pressed on a song in a list explicit Intent is being sent to NowPlayingActivity
 At the bottom there is also a TabLayout that works as menu, sending explicit Intent depending on the ImageView that is pressed.
This activity should be able to show up songs or playlists that matches what user entered in a ListView and open them up when clicked by sending explicit Intent to the NowPlayingActivity

This activity should be able to show up songs in a ListView that were added to the cart by the user. When user clicks on "Proceed to checkout" button implicit Intent will be sent to a web browser with a link to pay for the songs.

This activity should be able to show song image, play, stop, change song, shuffle songs and activate repeat modes. MediaPlayer class is needed to add this functionality
There are a back button at the top which sends explicit intent to MainActivity. 
Pressing favorite icon should add the song to favorite playlist.
Pressing add to cart icon should add the song to the cart.
